## Symphonic Remasters: Redux
e17f6212-2f51-4c51-b2e3-ca3bafcf2b6b unab0mb, Symphonic Remasters http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=20240.0
iros://Url/http://7thheaven.rocks/releases/Symphonic_Remasters_Redux.iro 2.0 2020-07-18 All https://i.imgur.com/n0H52S0.png A re-release of the Symphonic Remasters FF7 soundtrack with the overall volume levels now closely matching the game's OST, other volume/loop fixes, Loopstart only, on/off selection of individual tracks, reduced file size, and high-resolution intro/ending videos now with SFX. All made from the original lossless audio and packaged for 7th Heaven. 519168
0 Symphonic Remasters: Redux Complete FF7 soundtrack replacement in a symphonic style. Thanks to Bonez for the artwork and Satsuki for video upscales! To hear the included intro/ending movies, place this mod above other movie mods. If other music mods include movies, disable the movies from the other mods if possible. Media
unab0mb Symphonic Remasters Music Media

## Borderless Windowed FF7 ##
7350eb7e-6b4f-4a9c-8a70-28d6304f8ce7 unab0mb https://forums.qhimm.com/
iros://Url/http://7thheaven.rocks/mods/Borderless_FF7_(BFF7)_v1.0.iro 1.00 2020-03-10 All http://7thheaven.rocks/mods/previewimages/BFF7-Preview.gif
1690
Borderless Windows FF7 Miscellaneous AutoHotKey based borderless window hack for FF7. REQUIRES 7H 2.0+! -Your FF7 window title MUST start with 'Final Fantasy VII'. -Press 8 to toggle window border. -Press 9 to left align window. -Press 0 to right align window. -Press - to center window. -Press = to toggle borderless fullscreen. (Set your desired resolution in Game Driver Settings first!)
Unab0mb MotR

AxlRose Avatars User Interface Replaces the in-game portraits of your characters with a Remake style version. - New super hot Yuffie, Cid, Young Cloud, Vincent, Cait Sith, and Chocobo models. - Now compatible with the FFNx Driver to use the DDS format (Not Required). - Removed Aali and FFNx manual switch option, the switch is now automatic. - New Type A, Type B, Type C, Type D, and Type E sets. - Type Y and Z are now the old Pencil Drawing Avatars sets.

## Satsuki SYW V5 Field Textures ##
67a972fc-99e1-4279-839b-4e31e0a4fe2a Satsuki_Yatoshi, Manakaiser, Aavock, L@ZaR0 http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=20434.0
iros://Url/https://syw.7thheaven.rocks/iros/[Tsunamods].SYW.V5.Field.Textures.V5.10.7z 5.0 2021-05-05 All https://i.imgur.com/2ddBcgw.jpg The textures are as close as possible to vanilla textures, but AI upscaled with lots of manual tweaks to get an HD experience of the original game design. This pack also upscales all of the field animations. Those animations can cause slowdown on some fields on some computers. If you get slowdown, please disable the "Advanced Texture Animations" option. (double click on this mod and turn off the "Advanced Texture Animations") To get proper Advanced Texture Animations you need to: -Be on the lastest updated 7th Heaven version from here: https://github.com/tsunamods-codes/7th-Heaven/releases. (Scroll down, click "Assets", and grab 7thHeaven-vxxx_Release.zip) -Then go in 7th "Settings/General Settings" and on the bottom-left you'll find the FFNx section, click canary then check for updates, say yes and then go to "Settings/Game Driver Settings, and click "Restore defaults" next to save. -Then go in 7th "Settings/Game Driver - Animated Textures" and set it to ON. 2300000
[Tsunamods] Satsuki SYW V5 Field Textures Field Textures AI upscaled field textures
Satsuki Field Textures MotR
